reviewText:
Franz Moeckl gives a clear instruction on the art of Qi Gong.
I came to it when diagnosed with cancer and it helped me get through the treatments. I do the half hour practice with Franz Moeckl every morning and each time I feel calmer and refreshed.
Ram Daas's singing adds a wonderful depth to the experience.

I highly recommend this DVD.

this is the chance to experience body movement with grace and fluidity.  the teacher Franz Moeckl is outstanding and makes is ease to understand and practice.
this is a must.  I am over 70 and love it
